author: JetMETdqmval
body:
equivalent to 75X PR https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/9938
Fix the issues observed in the unscheduled modes for MET Validation and JetMET DQM by cloning modules which are modified later on. As consequence the type1 MET folders will be renamed. Updated the PUJetID producers to the latest version (training still based on 53X though).
title: JetMET DQM and MET Validation unscheduled mode fix
